```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(viridis)
library(hrbrthemes)
```

```{r}
season_2022 <- read_csv("2022-seaason-data-csv.csv")
season_2024 <- read_csv("2024-season-data-csv.csv")
data_stacked <- bind_rows(season_2022, season_2024)
```

## Radar Chart w/ Metrics

```{r}
data_clean <- data_stacked %>%
  select(c(1:5, 13:14, 23:27)) %>%
  mutate(Season = substr(Date, 1, 4), .after = 'Date') 
data_bruins <- data_clean %>%
  filter(Team == 'UCLA Bruins')
summary(data_bruins)
data_bruins
data_bruins_long <- data_bruins %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(7:13), names_to = "Variable", values_to = "Value")
data_bruins_long
```



## Parallel Coordinates Plot w/ ggally

```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE, fig.width = 14}
ggparcoord(data_bruins, columns = c(7:13), scale = "globalminmax", groupColumn = 2, showPoints = TRUE, title = "Parallel Coordinate Plot, 2022 vs 2024 Bruins", alphaLines = 0.5) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) +
  theme(legend.position = "top")
```

```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE, fig.width = 14}
ggplot(data_bruins_long, aes(x=Variable, y=Value, fill=Season)) + 
  geom_violin(position="dodge", alpha=0.5, color="black") +
  geom_boxplot(width=0.1, color="white") +
  theme_ipsum() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(plot.background=element_rect(fill = "grey"),
  panel.background = element_rect(fill = 'black'))
```
